授業目的: The main purpose of this class is to develop students’ ability to write various kinds of texts. Students begin by writing paragraphs, and then short, multi-paragraph essays. To improve fluency students will write journals and do timed writing exercises.
到達目標: The aim of this course is to help students write clearly in English on a number of  topics and to bridge the gap between short assignments and longer research papers.
授業方法: Most class sessions will be divided between peer sharing (e.g., journals and essay drafts) and textbook work. Some class sessions will have timed writing assignments or quizzes in place of peer sharing.

第1回: Introduction to the course. Explanation of the syllabus. Introduction to process writing. Explanation of standard paragraph layout. General vocabulary assessment.
